class tdp.classic_algorithms_tdp.PtychographicIterativeEngine(delay, frequency, measured_trace, nonlinear_method, pie_method='rPIE', cross_correlation=False, **kwargs)

Bases: RetrievePulsesTDP, PtychographicIterativeEngine

The Ptychographic Iterative Engine (PIE) for FROG.

pie_method

specifies the PIE variant. Can be one of None, PIE, ePIE, rPIE. Where None indicates that the pure gradient is used.

Type:

None, str

class tdp.general_algorithms_tdp.LSF(delay, frequency, measured_trace, nonlinear_method, cross_correlation=False, **kwargs)

Bases: LSFBASE, RetrievePulsesTDP

The LSF Algorithm applied to TDP.

get_pulses_from_population(population, measurement_info, descent_info)

Returns the pulse and gate population. Does not need to call get_pulses_t_from_population() since LSF works with discetized fields only.

convert_population(population, measurement_info, descent_info)

Converts any population into a discretized one.
